This data sets illustrate a nonlinear mixed model f=a1-a2*exp(-a3*day) to describe the growth of 12 tumor spheroids (Chapter 6).
Apparently, each tumor has its own starting and limiting volume and therefore a1 and a2 should be random (tumor-specific).
This model is an example of marginal nonlinear mixed model. Several special methods of estimation, including Total GEE, are considered.
We derive three critical points of the log-Gompertz growth.
Here pMTS indicates the tumor (cluster) and LOGvolume=log(Volume).


obs pMTS day    LOGvolume 
 1    1   1 1.5347143662
 2    1   2 2.5802168296
 3    1   5 3.0680529351
 4    1   6 3.6136169696
 5    1   7 3.8543938926
 6    1   8 4.0775374439
 7    1   9 4.2835865619
 8    1  12 4.4773368145
 9    1  13 4.5695430083
10    1  14 4.5695430083
11    1  15 4.6634390941
